original_text: We came from Babylon during the time that Artaxerxes was king. These are the leaders of clans who came with me, and the names of their families:
korean_text: 아닥사스다 왕이 왕위에 있을 때에 나와 함께 바벨론에서 올라온 족장들과 그들의 계보는 이러하니라

sentences.original_text: during the time that Artaxerxes was king
These are the leaders of clans
and the names of their families
